title: Jenna Dewan was 'so gutted' by her divorce from Channing Tatum
text:
Jenna and Channing split last year (Picture: Broadimage/REX/Shutterstock)

Jenna Dewan has admitted she was ‘gutted’ by her divorce from husband Channing Tatum

The Step Up actress – who is pregnant with her first baby with boyfriend Steve Kazee – split from Channing in 2018 after nine years of marriage and 12 years together.

And Jenna, 38, says that there was ‘no one event’ that led to their divorce.

Writing in her new book Gracefully You: How To Live Your Best Life Every Day, in excerpts acquired by People, the dancer said: ‘People grow and they change and sometimes they don’t grow and change together. So it wasn’t a overnight thing that happened.

‘There was no one event. I think it was just a slow realisation that we wanted different things.’

The exes share daughter Everly (Picture: Matt Baron/REX/Shutterstock)

Jenna – who shares six-year-old daughter Everly with Channing – continued: ‘I was just gutted. It was so difficult for me. It was the loss of an idealistic future for myself and my life.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘What does that now look like for me? Where do I begin? I met him when I was 24, I didn’t know life without Chan.’

On adjusting to life as co-parents of Everly, Jenna said: ‘We’re all aware that it’s a new normal, we’re all getting used to it.

‘You can still have a relationship and just because the forms change as to who you are to each other, it doesn’t take away from the love that we had or that we shared all those years.’

Jenna is expecting her first baby with Steve (Picture: Jen Lowery / SplashNews.com)

Jenna added that she is now in a ‘joyful’ place in her life after meeting Steve.

The couple, who have been dating since last year, confirmed their pregnancy news last month, saying: ‘We are beyond overjoyed and couldn’t be happier to be expanding our family!’

And Steve, 43, is finding Jenna’s pregnancy mind-blowing, telling Entertainment Tonight: ‘It’s mind-blowing, the whole thing. Watching a child grow inside of a human has been the most amazing experience so far.’

Channing, 39, has also moved on from his marriage, with the Magic Mike star dating Jessie J.

The pair have been seeing each other since October 2018, and Channing has been supporting the Domino singer at her concerts, including her performance at Rock in Rio.

description: Jenna Dewan opens up on her divorce from Channing Tatum after confirming she is expecting her first baby with Steve Kazee.
